name: condensable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a gas) possible to make into a liquid or solid state: Water is among the condensable products of the candle burning. We found that the vapour was condensable against a cold surface. Opposite
non-condensable
More examplesFewer examplesThe decomposition of biomass produces both condensable gases (vapour) and non-condensable gases. Estimates were made of the condensable proportion of material in the rings surrounding the planet.The condenser, in addition to removing condensable contaminants, greatly reduces the volume of the waste exhaust. This process greatly increases the amount of oily or condensable product.
